sentences.english: She would like it signed on a Russian sable coat.
sentences.chinese: 她想讓他把名字簽在一件俄羅斯的紫貂皮大衣上。

sentences.english: I should say this, that Pat doesn't have a mink coat.
sentences.chinese: 我應該澄清的是，帕特並沒有貂皮大衣。

sentences.english: I don't want a mink coat!
The fur length and quality were good.
sentences.chinese: 貂皮尺碼和皮張質量優良。

sentences.english: How much is this maxi fur coat?
sentences.chinese: 那件迷嬉式的貂皮大衣要多少錢？

sentences.english: Now we wish to ask your company to sell these marten overcoats on consignment.
sentences.chinese: 這次，我想請貴公司幫助我們代銷這批貂皮大衣。

sentences.english: Show me some sable, will you ?
sentences.chinese: 給我拿紫貂皮看看的好嗎？

sentences.english: No one in this world needs a mink coat but a mink.
sentences.chinese: 除了貂沒有人需要貂皮。

sentences.english: You look great in the mink coat.
sentences.chinese: 你穿那件貂皮大衣看起來棒極了。

sentences.english: You've told me three times now that Jane bought a new mink coat.
sentences.chinese: 你已經告訴我三次，說珍習了件新的貂皮大衣。

sentences.english: Of mink, whole, with or without head, tail or paws.
sentences.chinese: 整張水貂皮，不論是否帶頭，尾或爪。

sentences.english: She was wearing the ermine toque she'd bought when her hair was yellow.
sentences.chinese: 她戴的貂皮無沿帽是在她頭髮還是黃色時買的。

sentences.english: Some rich women splurge on diamond rings and mink coats.
sentences.chinese: 有些富婆在鑽戒和貂皮外套上揮霍金錢。

sentences.english: Now we would like to ask your company to sell these marten overcoats on consignment.
sentences.chinese: 這次，我想請貴公司幫助我們代銷這批貂皮大衣。

sentences.english: She was wearing a blue dress and a mink coat.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着一件藍色的衣服和一件貂皮大衣。

sentences.english: How much is your mink coat?

definition: coat/jacket/short and lined coat or robe
